t: Private Report Shows How Amazon Drastically Undercounts Its Carbon Footprint
s: March 28, 2023 - But when shoppers click “Buy Now” on those same products on Amazon, the nation’s largest online retailer doesn’t count those carbon emissions. Amazon takes responsibility for the full climate impact only of products with an Amazon brand label, which make up about 1% of its online sales.
